completeListOfAbilities.name: Black Materia
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Reduces all enemies' BRV to 0 (excluding enemies afflicted with Break)
Increases BRV based on ATK + group  PF attack
Deals total HP damage to each target
Self: 6 turns 1 level of Reunion (limit 5)
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count
